{{Infobox Berry |name = #12 Nanab |image = [[File:Nanab.png]] |caption = Bitter, but with a trace of sweetness, the Nanab Berry was the seventh to be discovered in the word. |growtime = 4m 10s |harvest = 11 berries |replant = 40% |mutation = 1.7% |points = 25 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Nanab''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Pecha]] and at least 1 [[Aspear]]. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable"| style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 25 secs || 30 secs || 35 secs || 4 mins 10 secs - 8 mins 20 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NanabTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NanabTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:NanabTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 4 mins 10 secs -
8 mins 20 secs |- ! Sprayduck | 2 mins 47 secs -
5 mins 53 secs |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Nanab_Flow_Chart.png|200px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Nanab berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Pecha.png|30px]] [[Pecha]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |} === Timing Table === {| class="wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Aspear]] || - || - || - |- | [[Pecha]] || 1 min until ripe || 40 secs until ripe || Not Practical |- |} ==Uses== ===Mutations=== Nanab berries can be used to mutate the following berries. {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Magost.png|20px]] [[Magost]] || [[File:Pecha.png|20px]] [[Pecha]]
[[File:Mago.png|20px]] [[Mago]] |- | [[File:Roseli.png|20px]] [[Roseli]] || [[File:Mago.png|20px]] [[Mago]]
[[File:Magost.png|20px]] [[Magost]]
[[File:Watmel.png|20px]] [[Watmel]] |- |} ===[[Safari Zone]] bait=== As a type of bait, Nanab berries give Pok√©mon in the Safari Zone "eating" status for 2 - 6 turns, and boosts catch chance by 1.5x for the rest of the encounter unless another type of bait is used.
{{Berries}}
